title: Clear night, slow city driving with 6 braking events
caption: A slow-moving vehicle on a quiet city street at night, with 6 braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.7 m/s). There are 6 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is in a residential area with speed limits and parked cars. The driver is being cautious and paying attention to the road and the surroundings. The 6 braking events could be due to the driver noticing a pedestrian or a parked car, or due to the road conditions. The driver needs to be extra careful at night to avoid any accidents.
